channel.title: The system cannot find the path specified and Client auto close?
channel.description:
Hey anybody that can help every time i try to start my server is says: The system cannot find the path specified press any key to continue How to solve that and: when i start my client im logged in for like 15 seconds than my client shuts down? Who can help with that well thats all for now
Bye
